column4: Hey I just downloaded Beryl can someone help me with its installtion I'm a little confused.
did you do it from apt-install?
if you got it from add-remove programs, you should just be able to run beryl manager from "system tools"
or try going to "add/remove  programs"  then make sure its set to "all programs"  , then search for beryl and get it.  It will do all the crap for you
